```{r}
sexedstats<-read.csv("/Users/jonathan/Documents/GitHub/DATS6101_Project-1/Tables/Project1_data_clean.csv")
State<-as.character(sexedstats$State)
Year<-as.integer(sexedstats$Year)
Enrollment<-as.integer(sexedstats$Enrollment)
State_Births<-as.numeric(sexedstats$State.Births)
US_Birth_No<-as.numeric(sexedstats$U.S..Births)
US_Birth_Rate<-as.numeric(sexedstats$U.S..Birth.Rate)
Age_Groups<-as.factor(sexedstats$Age.Group..Years.)
State_Birth_Rate<-as.numeric(sexedstats$State.Rate)
as.factor(sexedstats$Median.Household.Income)
```

```{r}
library(ggplot2)
ggplot(sexedstats, aes(y=State), aes(x=Year))+
  geom_boxplot(aes(State))+
  ggtitle("State")+
  labs(y="State", x="Year")
```

Note that the `echo = FALSE` parameter was added to the code chunk to prevent printing of the R code that generated the plot.
